snippet: The kuttiyattam performer Kapila Venu of India played all the characters in a production of “The Abandonment of Sita,” sponsored by Asia Society and Sanskriti Center.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews Asia Society and Sanskriti Center co-production of dance piece The Abandonment of Sita, performed in the ancient South Indian temple theater form kuttiyattam by dancer Kapila Venu.
lead_paragraph: The kuttiyattam performer Kapila Venu of India played all the characters in a production of “The Abandonment of Sita,” sponsored by Asia Society and Sanskriti Center.
